name: Mobee Dick
description:
Mobee Dick is a strategic and creative studio which specializes in research and design internet products and services. Our particular area of interest are mobile solutions - we are the leader in the domestic market. We help our customers to build products and services that stand out from the user experience and realize even the most sophisticated business needs.
We are experts on User Experience, Customer Experience and Design Thinking, but what distinguishes us from the competition is passion and unique design methods.
We also advise our clients on how to effectively use digital marketing tools to build marketing strategies and product strategies, how to build creative teams and implement effective product processes in organizations.
READ MORE...
